msbt.message: At lastit's the Year of the Mouse!<10_4 /> It's time for me to crawl outta my hole and get myself that cheese!Or maybe it's time for me to toast the new year with , !
<10_10 />Yeeeeee-HAW!<10_4 /><10_9 /> I'm all riled up right now 'cause this here is the Year of the Cow! I can't lose in ! Get ready for the Year of !
You bet I'm jazzed! We got ourselves a Year of the Tiger now! A brand-new year, all about me! And I'm gonna be ROARIN' my way through the whole blamed thing!
Now it's the Year of the Rabbit Yeah, belongs to yours truly! I'm ready to win this race.
is the Year of the Horse! And lemme tell you, I'm chompin' at the bit to race into this new year! I plan on gettin' a good start right outta the gate. Just watch my dust!
It's the Year of the Sheep! My year!<10_4 /> I wool stop at nothin' to make the most of this year, just ewe watch!
Oh yeah! It's finally my year The Year of the Monkey!Hope 's ready for a year's worth of monkey business!
It's finally the Year of the Bird again!<10_4 /> Been restin' up my wings for 11 long years to get ready for this! I'm gonna soar higher'n an airplane in , just you wait and see!
Welcome to the Year of the Dog! That means this is my year!Instead of just followin' along, I'm gonna be leadin' the pack!
No matter what's in my way, I'm just gonna charge on ahead and do what I'm gonna do this year! Call me pig-headed if you want, but nothin's gonna stop me this year!
